page.title: 09Religion in Heybridge
page.content:
The area in and around Maldon and Heybridge has a strong history of{ {religious}influence. Indeed, at Bradwell are the remains of one of the earliest Christian churches in the land. However, in a survey conducted in and around Heybridge the results of a question asking about church attendance revealed a very low percentage of regular church-goers. The question asked was : "Do you reguarly attend a church service?"
Results : 6% answered Yes
(Note : Heybridge has been without a vicar for over a year and, although there are other churches in the locality, the results of the survey may have been adversely affected.
